title: Ep. 795 - The NFL Is Gay
description:
The NFL comes out of the closet, a British dude transitions to become a Korean, and Supreme Court “originalists” defend the supposed constitutional right of men to use the women’s bathroom.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
